item.title: Locarno Says Farewell to David Lynch With Tribute Film ‘An Unfinished Room…’
item.description: “His contribution to beauty, dreams, and art will never be forgotten,” artistic director Giona A. Nazzaro said. “And tonight, we celebrate him with this tiny, wonderful masterpiece, edited by Duwayne
